cause.description:
This cause is to raise the belive in the new form of unity, within our Great nation SYRIA. People are always afraid of the word, but what if we explained it in a modern manner similar to the united states of america or the european union, the historical Syrian states are: IRAQ, SYRIA, LEBANON, PALESTINE, KUWAIT, JORDAN, KILIKYA, AHWAZ, SINAA, and CYPRUS. A federal system shall govern these states so we can acheive self accomplishment!, and stand against all the aggressive attacks over our beloved nation.
1. Syria is for syrians and they both confirm a complete nation
cause.mission: Unite the states of GREAT SYRIA
cause.name: United States of Syria
